Detailed Description

AtResponseIterator provides an iterator like interface to retrieve AT responses. Data is read from a teminal and interpreted as AT response. NOTE: It is not allowed to derive from AtResponseParameter (no virtual destructor).

Member Function Documentation

const AtResponse AtResponseIterator::GetNextResponse (   ) 
 

Reads date from the socket until the next response delimiter (
) is read, and returns a structured response representing the received response

BOOLEAN AtResponseIterator::HasMoreResponses (   ) 
 

Returns false if the last received response was "CONNECT" or no more data for reading is available at the socket
